pages.content:
[HEADING] Graduate Study
[HEADING] Chemical & Environmental Engineering
[HEADING] Innovating for a Better Environment
The Chemical & Environmental Engineering Department at Yale offers several graduate degree options in Chemical Engineering or Environmental Engineering tracks including a joint degree program with the Yale School of the Environment. All Ph.D. students in Chemical & Environmental Engineering receive a generous financial package for at least six years of their studies. Our graduate programs prepare chemical and environmental engineers to become leaders in academia, government, industry, and entrepreneurship and innovation.
pages.title: Chemical & Environmental Engineering Grad Study | Yale Engineering
